thread.title: Jennifer Lopez gushes over twins on 9th birthday and reunites with Marc Anthony for special occasion
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez gushes over twins on 9th birthday and reunites with Marc Anthony for special occasion

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Jennifer Lopez gushes over twins on 9th birthday and reunites with Marc Anthony for special occasion
text:
Jennifer Lopez gushes over twins on 9th birthday and reunites with Marc Anthony for special occasion The star looked very proud of her kids in a snap shared online Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jennifer Lopez has reunited with Marc Anthony as they got back together to celebrate their twins' ninth birthday. 
The Jenny From The Block singer and her former flame got divorced seven years ago, but they still remain friends and were happy to put on a show of unity this week for Max and Emme's special day. 
A candid snap was shared on Instagram fan page 'slayitlikejlo' this week, showing the star cuddled up in bed for a selfie with her kids. J-Lo and the twins (Photo: slayitlikejlo/Instagram) 
The exes were happy to reunite for the occasion, and they were joined by the twins' godmother Leah Remini and her husband Angelo Pagan on Monday. 
The former King of Queens actress posted a snap of the grown-ups on her own social media page. 
"Celebrating our Max & Emme's 9th birthday @jlo @marcanthony @therealangelopagan #familia #memories #friendship (sic)," she wrote alongside it. Jennifer Lopez (L) and Marc Anthony perform onstage during the 17th Annual Latin Grammy Awards (Photo: WireImage) 
It's said he has already moved on from his former partner with the model, who he was said to be instantly taken by when they first met at a dinner party. 
Speaking about the dark-haired hunk's romance, a source told TMZ: "Marc was immediately smitten." Like us on Facebook
